name: A Story of an Outcast
description:
201.3M years ago, a young meteoroid was wandering around the world, looking for a place to fit in and call home.

Come and join the untold story of the faraway outcast, exploring Earth's land.  

Controls:
Start - 'Left Click'
Jump - 'Space'

Designer - Ori Shany
Guidance: Dani Bacon, Ruru Modan
Art and Interaction Class, Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, 2022.
